properties.Name: PartyOpinion
properties.Description:
The Opinion(s) that a specific Individual has acknowledged was identified or recorded as of the indicated date.

Note:
For information of this type it makes most sense to simply record it as a 'date'  rather than a 'period start date/period end date', which would have very limited practical value.

If you understand what opinions customers hold you know what is important to them.

Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Opinions describe what a consumer 'believes in', such as politics, education or social issues.

Ex:

Opinion = organic foods are healthier
Opinion Type = food

Opinion = on-line banking is convenient
Opinion Type = bank services

Opinion = stocks are risk investments
Opinion Type = Investing

Opinion = cellular phone are safe to use
Opinion Type = cellular phone safety

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups holding specific opinions.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIO's to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.

A wise strategy is to identify the opinions that are to be gathered and ask them to customers in one or more surveys.   This enables the business to gather information about opinions that the business has an interest in rather than allowing the customer to provide opinions that may be irrelevant to the business.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: OpinionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Opinion.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: AioLevelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an AIO Level.

Columns.Name: PartyOpinionNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment, additional information regarding the associated Opinion that the Individual has acknowledged or reported.
